import React from 'react' const About = () => { return (

About me!

Hey! My name is Devam, and I'm a Computer Science student at the Georgia Institute of Technology interested in the intersection of machine learning and other disciplines. Throughout my past experiences, whether be internships or research positions, I have developed strong technical skills while forging an ability to communicate the business value of complex systems. This drives me to the intersection of research engineering and entrepreneurship; I envision myself making research more practical. I am actively searching for Summer 2025 internships, so please feel free to reach out with any opportunities @ dmondal9@gatech.edu or devammondal123@gmail.com! Right now, I'm working on a bioinformatics startup while serving as a research assistant at the Georgia Tech Sustainable Urban Systems Lab with Dr. Patrick Kastner, the Lu Lab @ Hackensack Meridian CDI under Dr. Binfeng Lu, and the Center for Systems and Enterprises @ Stevens Institute of Technology under Dr. Carlo Lipizzi. Google Scholar: https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=IYqjEm8AAAAJ&hl=en GitHub: https://github.com/Dodesimo

) } export default About
